EmailTemplate.subject: New Release Updates on AOG and Communications & Documentations
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Aircraft on Ground (AOG): We have fully automated the Aircraft on Ground order process. Customers may now submit orders for Exchange Parts and/or Repair Services via the Online Ordering in support of an AOG.Â To view the release note for this and an FAQ please refer to this page: https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace/release-notes/2020/online-ordering-aog <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace/release-notes/2020/online-ordering-aog]]>
Communications and Documentations: Now authorized service centers in Business and General Aviation can quickly search and locate documents like Aftermarket Program Information Letters (APILS), Special Pricing Notices (SPN) or other letters. They can be accessed from the service center tools <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/services-and-support/repair-services/bga-service-center]]> or directly at this link: https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/downloads/comm-and-docs <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/downloads/comm-and-docs]]>
To catch up on latest improvements to MyAerospace, please refer to our Release Notes page here: https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace/release-notes <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace/release-notes]]>
